segments.text: Ugh, what a mess in this kitchen already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is filthy, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at those kids, climbing like little thieves for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is all crooked and about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's shoving his hand into the jar, making crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just begging for one, like it's not gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage on the cabinetsâ€” that's going to smell musty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window view can't save this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how oblivious and careless everyone is here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is why I hate messy kitchens like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
